NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
COLEUS: Friends, the forge is asking for one last shipment of ore to be delivered to <color=lightblue>Hollow's Lantern</color>. We must work quickly, as construction begins soon!
2
1
CYCAD: Isn't the construction of <color=lightblue>Ash Twin's</color> protective shell complete? What will this new shipment of ore be used for?
3 2
COLEUS: In the construction of the <color=orange>Sanctuary,</color> of course!
4 3
COLEUS: Even though it was formed here, the ore still requires treatment at <color=lightblue>Hollow's Lantern</color> to reach its full capabilities.
5
4
OENO: And thanks to the <color=orange>new projection stone</color> Daz has developed, we won't have to wait for the installation of a warp receiver before sealing the <color=orange>Sanctuary's</color> exterior!
6
5
CYCAD: What? But how will anyone enter the <color=orange>Sanctuary</color> once it is sealed, without a warp receiver installed inside?
7
6
OENO: You should visit the <color=orange>Scroll and Stone Workshop</color> on <color=lightblue>Giant's Deep</color> sometime to learn about Daz's work, Cycad - seeing as we will be using his new voyager stone to access the <color=orange>Sanctuary!</color>
8
7
COLEUS: Additionally, the site for the <color=orange>Sanctuary's</color> construction was chosen specifically to make use of a quantum shard that travels inside it.
9
8
COLEUS: As the site is located in a cavern within the planet's groundwater pools, we will need to put extra eyes into carefully reinforcing the walls of the <color=orange>Sanctuary.</color>
10
9
CYCAD: We should start as soon as we can, then. If it means we can ensure the safety of the native lifeforms without increasing the <color=orange>Black Hole Forge's</color> workload, all our efforts will be worth it!
11
10
COLEUS: I am glad to hear your enthusiasm!
12
11
COLEUS: Is everyone rested up? Then let us begin our work shortly, my friends!
Nomai Mine Entry 2 8
